description: Purpose built for ultra-zoom cameras, Lowepro's Adventura Ultra Zoom 100 shoulder bag delivers a compact and easyaccesssolution with an adjust-to-fit design. A padded removable divider adjusts to fit most of the smallest to largestmodels. The opening features a cut-away shape and is placed low on the front, making it easy to grab a camera by its gripand capture the shot in a moment. Inside, the Adventura Ultra Zoom 100 is lined with soft, brushed tricot to protect anLCD screen and lens from scratches and abrasion. Built-in memory card and battery pockets offer convenient andprotected storage space. Outside, a back slash pocket provides fast-access to a cell phone, MP3 player or small personalitem. Wear the Adventura Ultra Zoom 100 on the shoulder via the adjustable shoulder strap, or carry it by the quick-grabhandle. Dual zipper pulls offer quick access to the camera when partially opened and extra security when fully closed. TheAdventura Ultra Zoom 100 is available in Black.
title: Lowepro LP36214 Adventura Ultra Zoom 100 Shoulder Bag - Black
